description: Try our easy to follow Barbecued Bolar Blade Roast Beef With Chimichurri recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast beef,Roast,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Barbecued Bolar Blade Roast Beef With Chimichurri Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red onion, thinly sliced into rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue with a hood to 200Â°C on medium heat.

Place beef in a roasting pan and drizzle over 1 tbs oil, then season. Place beef on barbecue and cook, hood down, for 50 minutes for medium or until cooked to your liking. Rest for 30 minutes before slicing.

Combine 2 tsp vinegar and 2 tbs oil in a large bowl. Add onion and tomato, tossing to coat, then set aside. Combine parsley, garlic and remaining vinegar in small bowl. Gradually add remaining oil, stirring to combine, and season.
Add salad leaves to tomato mixture, tossing to combine. Serve beef with salad and chimichurri spooned over the top.
